actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to eliminate annual and lifetime aggregate limits imposed by health plans.
short_title: Annual and Lifetime Health Care Limit Elimination Act of 2009

summary.text: Annual and Lifetime Health Care Limit Elimination Act of 2009 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) and the Public Health Service Act to prohibit a group health plan from imposing an aggregate dollar annual or lifetime limit with respect to benefits payable under the plan. Applies such prohibition to individual health insurance coverage.

titles.title: Annual and Lifetime Health Care Limit Elimination Act of 2009
A bill to eliminate annual and lifetime aggregate limits imposed by health plans.
